content: the gap-tastic cowl is an easy knit you ll want to make again and again this fun cowl is a great beginner project for new knitters who want to practice knitting and purling and it s a fantastic mindless knit for experienced knitters either way the gap-tastic is a classic accessory that you ll wear all of the time it makes a great gift too now available in french a huge thank you to misstlog 2 for providing the translation thanks lydia now available in german - thank you jessica pawlitzki now available in slovak 4 thanks to andrea laca 2 http //www ravelry com/people/misstlog 4 http //klbkoviny skip/navody/doplnky/na-krk/gap-tasticky-nakrcnik/
